content:
abrown commented on issue #4382:

Sorry about the breakage in this script. The issue is that v0.4.* of the openvino crates had to break backwards compatibility (see https://github.com/intel/openvino-rs/releases/tag/v0.4.0 for the rationale). If we update the version of OpenVINO used for the script, this error should go away. I have a GitHub action that should "do the right thing;" perhaps we should replace the .github/actions/install-openvino directory with that?

sunfishcode commented on issue #4382:

Makes sense to me. I'll close this in favor of #4383.
